name: Orchard Heroic
description:
Orchard Heroic is a Metroidvania taking place in Orchard, a once peaceful land now ridden with monsters. It is your job as a descendant of the hero who once saved Orchard to restore peace to the land, by restoring the power of the four seeds of light!

The game is currently just a short demo made using GBStudio 2.0.0 within a day.

Keyboard controls for PC Browser:
Arrow Keys (Directional Pad) - Move
Z (A Button) - Interact/OK
X (B Button) - Jump

* This is a Game Boy game. Saving and Loading is not functional in browser, it is recommended to play the ROM using a Game Boy emulator instead.
